name: Shining Draw
desc:
To activate this card, you must draw it for your normal draw in your Draw Phase, reveal it, and keep it revealed until the Main Phase 1. During your Main Phase 1 that same turn: You can target 1 "Utopia" Xyz Monster you control, then activate 1 of these effects.
●Equip any number of "ZW -" monsters with different names from your Deck/Extra Deck to it.
●Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Utopia" Xyz Monster with a different name from that target, by using that target as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.)
